nodes.excerpt: You can now speed up your workflow right from within your VS Code environment. Here are some key features of the plugin: - Preview Lottie files - Edit Lottie files - Search through animations on LottieFiles - Extract and view a dotLottie file and its contents
nodes.title: LottieFiles for VS Code - Speed up your Lottie workflow right from within VS Code
nodes.author: Jawish Hameed

localize.tagline: 直接从VS代码中加速您的Lottie工作流

nodes.excerpt: ODD is an 8-week program for ambitious designers who want to hone their skills, increase their impact and become world-class design leaders – surrounded by a community of incredible peers.
nodes.title: On Deck Designer Fellowship - Turning designers into world-class design leaders
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: ODD是一个为期8周的项目，面向雄心勃勃的设计师，他们想要磨练自己的技能，增加自己的影响力，成为世界级的设计领袖-周围都是令人难以置信的同行社区。
localize.tagline: 让设计师成为世界级的设计领军人物

localize.description: ODD是一個爲期8周的項目，面向雄心勃勃的設計師，他們想要磨練自己的技能，增加自己的影響力，成爲世界級的設計領袖-周圍都是令人難以置信的同行社區。
localize.tagline: 讓設計師成爲世界級的設計領軍人物

nodes.excerpt: To get somewhere in life, business, study, relationships or anything else, it's important to get guidance from a mentor. But finding the right mentor is difficult. Mentspot provides a simple way to get connected with Mentors and Mentees in any category.
nodes.title: MentSpot - Find a mentor or become one for free
nodes.author: Aleksandra Sztemberg

localize.description: 要想在生活、商业、学习、人际关系或任何其他方面有所成就，得到导师的指导是很重要的。但是很难找到合适的导师。MentSpot提供了一种与任何类别的导师和学员联系的简单方式。
localize.tagline: 寻找导师或免费成为导师

localize.description: 要想在生活、商業、學習、人際關係或任何其他方面有所成就，得到導師的指導是很重要的。但是很難找到合適的導師。MentSpot提供了一種與任何類別的導師和學員聯繫的簡單方式。
localize.tagline: 尋找導師或免費成爲導師

nodes.excerpt: Fiddy is a weekly leaderboard of the best new Indie Hacker side projects. Like, comment on, or share the best projects you find, or submit your own to compete every week.
nodes.title: Fiddy 2.0 - A weekly leaderboard of the best new side projects
nodes.author: Hessel Dijkstra

localize.description: Fiddy是最好的新独立黑客辅助项目的每周排行榜。喜欢、评论或分享你找到的最好的项目，或者每周提交你自己的项目参加竞争。
localize.tagline: 每周一次的最佳新辅助项目排行榜

localize.tagline: 每週一次的最佳新輔助項目排行榜

nodes.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
nodes.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates
nodes.author: Brandyn Morelli

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。
localize.tagline: 通過單向視頻更新安排更少的縮放會議

nodes.excerpt: Our Polaris for Admin Web UI kit is now available in Figma. You can access the full kit in Figma with reusable components and up-to-date Polaris guidelines, icons, and color palette. Find out more at https://figma.com/@shopify and https://polaris.shopify.com

localize.tagline: Shopify Polaris UI套件现已在图中提供

nodes.excerpt: Control your television from your iPhone or iPad with TV Remote. * As featured on 9to5Mac * Compatible with: - LG - Samsung - Hitachi - Sharp - Toshiba - JVC - Bush - Techwood - Telefunken - Linsar - Polaroid - Luxor - Vestel - Finlux + MORE!

nodes.excerpt: Mornin shows you where you are spending your time so that you can make the most of it. It is a chrome extension that works with Google Calendar.
nodes.title: Mornin - Smart categorization for your calendar events
nodes.author: Mehul Marakana

localize.description: 晨间告诉你你在哪里度过你的时间，这样你就可以最大限度地利用时间。它是一个Chrome扩展，可以与Google Calendar一起使用。
localize.tagline: 对您的日历事件进行智能分类

localize.description: 晨間告訴你你在哪裏度過你的時間，這樣你就可以最大限度地利用時間。它是一個Chrome擴展，可以與Google Calendar一起使用。
localize.tagline: 對您的日曆事件進行智能分類

nodes.excerpt: Filma is here to simplify the complex, giving all users; from experienced editors to first-time hobbyists, the ability to create powerful video compositions in a fast and effective manner. ⠀ Advanced features include Masking, Keyframing or Motion Tracking.
nodes.title: Filma - High-end video editing on the go for iPhone, iPad and Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Filma在这里简化了复杂的功能，为所有用户提供了从经验丰富的编辑到第一次业余爱好者的能力，能够以快速有效的方式创建强大的视频合成。⠀高级功能包括遮罩、关键帧设置或运动跟踪。
localize.tagline: 针对iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端视频随时随地编辑

localize.description: Filma在這裏簡化了複雜的功能，爲所有用戶提供了從經驗豐富的編輯到第一次業餘愛好者的能力，能夠以快速有效的方式創建強大的視頻合成。⠀高級功能包括遮罩、關鍵幀設置或運動跟蹤。
localize.tagline: 針對iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端視頻隨時隨地編輯

nodes.excerpt: Scheduling meetings is often a tradeoff between ensuring the meeting happens and protecting your focus time. Motion gives you the best of both worlds, finding the best times for internal and external meetings while increasing the chances the meeting happens.
nodes.title: Motion Scheduler - Reclaim an hour of deep work for every meeting scheduled
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 安排会议通常是在确保会议召开和保护您的焦点时间之间进行权衡。Motion让你两全其美，找到内部和外部会议的最佳时间，同时增加会议发生的机会。
localize.tagline: 为安排好的每个会议收回一小时的深入工作时间

localize.description: 安排會議通常是在確保會議召開和保護您的焦點時間之間進行權衡。Motion讓你兩全其美，找到內部和外部會議的最佳時間，同時增加會議發生的機會。
localize.tagline: 爲安排好的每個會議收回一小時的深入工作時間

nodes.excerpt: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
nodes.title: No More Facebook - Privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products ❤️
nodes.author: Kai Oelfke

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook产品的隐私友好型替代品。通过尝试这些替代方案，完全替换FB或减少使用它。建议一个隐私友好的替代方案，帮助人们减少对一家公司的依赖。
localize.tagline: facebook产品的隐私友好替代方案❤️

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook產品的隱私友好型替代品。通過嘗試這些替代方案，完全替換FB或減少使用它。建議一個隱私友好的替代方案，幫助人們減少對一家公司的依賴。
localize.tagline: facebook產品的隱私友好替代方案❤️

nodes.excerpt: Not everyone has fast internet. If your page loads very slowly, your users will have less time to browse your site and your bounce rate will increase. This causes you to lose your customers.
nodes.title: Screpy 2.0 - All-In-One SEO and website analysis tool
nodes.author: Mustafa Aydemir

localize.description: 并不是每个人都有快速的互联网。如果您的页面加载非常慢，您的用户浏览您的站点的时间将会减少，而您的跳出率将会增加。这会导致您失去客户。
localize.tagline: 一体式SEO和网站分析工具

localize.description: 並不是每個人都有快速的互聯網。如果您的頁面加載非常慢，您的用戶瀏覽您的站點的時間將會減少，而您的跳出率將會增加。這會導致您失去客戶。
localize.tagline: 一體式SEO和網站分析工具

nodes.excerpt: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
nodes.title: Base64.ai - Extract text, data, photos and more from all types of docs
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Base64.ai是一种云API，可以从所有类型的文档中提取数据、照片和签名。我们预建了ID、驾照、护照、签证、发票和更多文档类型的模型。集成只是一次API调用。
localize.tagline: 从所有类型的文档中提取文本、数据、照片等

localize.description: Base64.ai是一種雲API，可以從所有類型的文檔中提取數據、照片和簽名。我們預建了ID、駕照、護照、簽證、發票和更多文檔類型的模型。集成只是一次API調用。
localize.tagline: 從所有類型的文檔中提取文本、數據、照片等

nodes.excerpt: Tails is the ultimate TailwindCSS Page Creator. Need a website for your next great idea? Tails is the perfect tool to creating a beautiful landing page. Over 120 design blocks you can mix and match to craft the perfect landing page for your next project.
nodes.title: Tails - The ultimate TailwindCSS drag'n drop page creator
nodes.author: Tony Lea

localize.description: Tails是终极TailwinCSS页面创建器。需要一个网站来展示你的下一个好点子吗？Tails是创建漂亮登录页面的完美工具。超过120个设计模块，您可以混合搭配，为您的下一个项目制作完美的登录页。
localize.tagline: 终极TailwinCSS拖放页面创建器

localize.description: Tails是終極TailwinCSS頁面創建器。需要一個網站來展示你的下一個好點子嗎？Tails是創建漂亮登錄頁面的完美工具。超過120個設計模塊，您可以混合搭配，爲您的下一個項目製作完美的登錄頁。
localize.tagline: 終極TailwinCSS拖放頁面創建器

nodes.excerpt: Easyclout is a powerful, simple, all-in-one social media management and growth platform that helps businesses reduce social media marketing costs with our state of the art AI bot. Saving you time, increase productivity, and achieve better business results.
nodes.title: EasyClout - Social media management and growth platform
nodes.author: Bill Hinostroza

localize.description: Eascleout是一个强大、简单、一体式的社交媒体管理和增长平台，通过我们最先进的AI机器人帮助企业降低社交媒体营销成本。为您节省时间、提高工作效率并取得更好的业务成果。
localize.tagline: 社交媒体管理和增长平台

localize.description: Eascleout是一個強大、簡單、一體式的社交媒體管理和增長平臺，通過我們最先進的AI機器人幫助企業降低社交媒體營銷成本。爲您節省時間、提高工作效率並取得更好的業務成果。
localize.tagline: 社交媒體管理和增長平臺

nodes.excerpt: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
nodes.title: Haystack - Ship faster and improve dev happiness
nodes.author: Gustaf Alströmer

localize.description: 借助由您的Github数据提供支持的工程分析，加快发货速度并提高团队满意度。--→可视化整个交付过程，从提交到部署，→突出瓶颈(如代码审查)，→发现问题(如功能延迟和团队倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快发货速度，提高开发人员幸福感

localize.description: 藉助由您的Github數據提供支持的工程分析，加快發貨速度並提高團隊滿意度。--→可視化整個交付過程，從提交到部署，→突出瓶頸(如代碼審查)，→發現問題(如功能延遲和團隊倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快發貨速度，提高開發人員幸福感

nodes.excerpt: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020
nodes.title: GitWrapped - View/Share how you contributed to Github over the years
nodes.author: DanCodes

localize.description: GitWrased允许你查看这些年来你的Github个人资料的统计数据，你写了多少行，你完成了多少拉请求等等！与您的朋友比较统计数据并在社交媒体上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享这些年来您是如何为Github做出贡献的

localize.description: GitWrased允許你查看這些年來你的Github個人資料的統計數據，你寫了多少行，你完成了多少拉請求等等！與您的朋友比較統計數據並在社交媒體上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享這些年來您是如何爲Github做出貢獻的

nodes.excerpt: Open, browse, and drop icons from your existing IconJars. Add, delete, or replace icons in existing IconJars. Or, export your artboards to a new IconJar right in Illustrator - on Mac or Windows. You don't need to have IconJar installed (but we recommend it).
nodes.title: Icon Mason - Open, edit, & create IconJars directly in Adobe Illustrator
nodes.author: Scott Lewis

localize.description: 从现有的IconJars中打开、浏览和拖放图标。添加、删除或替换现有IconJars中的图标。或者，直接在Illustrator中将画板导出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安装IconJar(但我们建议您这样做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打开、编辑和创建IconJars

localize.description: 從現有的IconJars中打開、瀏覽和拖放圖標。添加、刪除或替換現有IconJars中的圖標。或者，直接在Illustrator中將畫板導出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安裝IconJar(但我們建議您這樣做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打開、編輯和創建IconJars

nodes.excerpt: Linksistent is a Chrome extension that provides a consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma design files or prototypes.
nodes.title: Linksistent - A consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma designs.

localize.description: Linksistent是一个Chrome扩展，为最新的Figma设计文件或原型提供统一的访问点。
localize.tagline: 适用于最新Figma设计的整合接入点。

localize.tagline: 適用於最新Figma設計的整合接入點。

nodes.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
nodes.title: Prospre - Generate custom meal plans with one click
nodes.author: Colin Hunt

localize.description: 只需点击一下，就可以计划一整周的用餐时间。只要告诉我们你喜欢哪些食物，以及你想吃多少卡路里、蛋白质、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。换一顿饭，换一天，或者换一周！我们可以安排您的款待，甚至还可以给您一张购物清单！
localize.tagline: 只需单击一次即可生成自定义餐饮计划

localize.description: 只需點擊一下，就可以計劃一整週的用餐時間。只要告訴我們你喜歡哪些食物，以及你想喫多少卡路里、蛋白質、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。換一頓飯，換一天，或者換一週！我們可以安排您的款待，甚至還可以給您一張購物清單！
localize.tagline: 只需單擊一次即可生成自定義餐飲計劃

nodes.excerpt: Quick Calc is a simple and easy-to-use calculator which can be directly accessed from the menu bar with the click of a button.
nodes.title: Quick Calc - An elegant calculator for your menu bar.
nodes.author: Aishanur Aydin

localize.description: Quick Calc是一个简单易用的计算器，只需单击一个按钮，即可从菜单栏直接访问。
localize.tagline: 一个优雅的计算器，为您的菜单栏。

localize.description: Quick Calc是一個簡單易用的計算器，只需單擊一個按鈕，即可從菜單欄直接訪問。
localize.tagline: 一個優雅的計算器，爲您的菜單欄。

nodes.excerpt: dev-flow is a website where you can view any person's GitHub statistics and timeline by entering their GitHub username.
nodes.title: dev-flow - View GitHub statistics and timeline by username.
nodes.author: Alper KARATAŞ

localize.description: Dev-Flow是一个网站，在这里你可以通过输入任何人的GitHub用户名来查看他们的GitHub统计数据和时间表。
localize.tagline: 按用户名查看GitHub统计数据和时间表。

localize.description: Dev-Flow是一個網站，在這裏你可以通過輸入任何人的GitHub用戶名來查看他們的GitHub統計數據和時間表。
localize.tagline: 按用戶名查看GitHub統計數據和時間表。
